## PL

---

What's the forties.plus about? It's a club for those who want to build and quickly launch digital products but don't have much time, skills, or determination. 
ðŸ˜Š



## Offer

![obraz](https://github.com/forties-plus/www/assets/5669657/c29b23ef-d0a8-4e39-b1fa-7b8ae0b708b1)



> ## All the Club benefits
> 
> ![Bulb icon][img1]
> 
> Weekly startup ideas
> 
> Every week you will receive an in-depth market analysis of a trening micro SAAS product
> 
> ![Table icon][img2]
> 
> Ready to acquire products
> 
> Each month we will build one of the ideas with no-code into working product you can acquire.
> 
> ![Wand icon][img3]
> 
> Community webinars
> 
> You can learn and watch how we are building a most voted product with no-code.
> 
> ![Charts Icon][img4]
> 
> Community chat
> 
> A place where you can meet fellow entrepreneurs like you.
> 
> ![Calendar icon][img5]
> 
> Our support
> 
> Handover meeting for acquired idea with the founders.
> 
> ![Brain icon][img6]
> 
> Daily inspirations
> 
> Get inspired about no-code product ideas by community members.
> 
> ![Pen icon][img7]
> 
> Founders stage (TBA)
> 
> Ability to present your own product with community.
>

                <div class="section-heading-wrapper">
                  <div class="decorative-element is-red"></div>
                  <h2 class="heading-large text-align-center">Frequently Asked Questions</h2>
                </div>
                <div class="faq-wrapper">
                  <div class="faq-question">
                    <div class="heading-small sand-800">Can you explain me the whole idea again - but make it short?</div>
                    <div class="faq-arrow">arrow_down</div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="faq-answer" style="width: 1232px;">
                    <div class="body-text content-secondary">Product Launchers Club it's a new generation of online community where we turn trending product ideas into reality. We start by sharing market analysis to pre-validate these ideas. Then, we quickly build them using no-code tools, allowing you to watch the process - you can learn from that on how to build the product by yourself. Finally, we offer you the opportunity to acquire what we've built. It's a unique chance to be directly involved in bringing new products to life!</div>
                  </div>
                </div>
                <div class="faq-wrapper">
                  <div class="faq-question">
                    <div class="heading-small sand-800">I am not sure if it's the right fit for me?</div>
                    <div class="faq-arrow">arrow_down</div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="faq-answer" style="height: 0px;">
                    <div class="body-text content-secondary">Only if you're looking to break free from the 9 to 5 grind or want to develop a side product OR if you've always dreamed of being a founder but didn't know where to begin OR if you lack technical skills or the determination needed to create a product OR if you're uncertain about how to manage or launch a product OR if you're interested in purchasing and monetizing products that have already been validated and are trending OR if you're eager to learn how to build products using No-Code tools in live sessions.<br><br>This initiative is definitely for you!</div>
                  </div>
                </div>
                <div class="faq-wrapper">
                  <div class="faq-question">
                    <div class="heading-small sand-800">Do I have to pay? What if I don't like it?</div>
                    <div class="faq-arrow">arrow_down</div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="faq-answer" style="height: 0px;">
                    <div class="body-text content-secondary">We offer a 14-day satisfaction guarantee for all the Club members. If for any reason you are not satisfied with the membership, contact us within 14 days from the date of your purchase, and we will refund the full amount without asking any questions.</div>
                  </div>
                </div>
                <div class="faq-wrapper">
                  <div class="faq-question">
                    <div class="heading-small sand-800">Do I need to know how to code?</div>
                    <div class="faq-arrow">arrow_down</div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="faq-answer" style="height: 0px;">
                    <div class="body-text content-secondary">No. The Club is not about programming. Firstly, you will get in-depth market and business analysis for the selected ideas. You can use this knowledge to launch using some external resources. Secondly, you can watch our webinars where we show you how the products are built with no-code (using Bubble.io), so no need for coding skills. Lastly, you can acquire the ready to market products we built and take it from there - you can either hire a freelancer/agency or master your no-code skills with a number of courses and tutorials.</div>
                  </div>
                </div>
                <div class="faq-wrapper">
                  <div class="faq-question">
                    <div class="heading-small sand-800">How is it possible to ship products so fast?</div>
                    <div class="faq-arrow">arrow_down</div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="faq-answer" style="height: 0px;">
                    <div class="body-text content-secondary">It's fascinating how fast we can build a product from scratch using no-code tools. This rapid development is possible because no-code platforms eliminate the need for traditional coding, allowing us to visually design and deploy applications quickly. However, what subscribers might not see is the extensive research and preparation that goes into this process beforehand. Before we even start building, we invest significant time in researching and selecting the right ideas for our newsletter. This foundational work ensures that when we do start creating with no-code tools, we're not just fast, but also effective, turning well-researched ideas into reality in record time.</div>
                  </div>
                </div>
                <div class="faq-wrapper">
                  <div class="faq-question">
                    <div class="heading-small sand-800">What tools do you use?</div>
                    <div class="faq-arrow">arrow_down</div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="faq-answer" style="height: 0px;">
                    <div class="body-text content-secondary">Mostly Bubble.io. Bubble is a popular and powerful no-code platform that allows users to build fully-functional web applications with ease. We build with Bubble because of its versatility, ease of use, and its robust community of users and resources, making it an ideal choice for startup founders.</div>
                  </div>
                </div>
                <div class="faq-wrapper">
                  <div class="faq-question">
                    <div class="heading-small sand-800">Can I maintain the project I buy?</div>
                    <div class="faq-arrow">arrow_down</div>
                  </div>
                  <div class="faq-answer" style="height: 0px;">
                    <div class="body-text content-secondary">Bubble has a growing community of millions of developers worldwide, so it would be easy to maintain and develop your project with freelancers or agencies eager to jump in to help you grow. Or you can master your skills as Bubble developer with number of courses and tutorials. We can help you with both of that - if you decide to buy you'll get a 1h handover meeting for acquired idea with product management and no code tips.</div>
                  </div>
                </div>
                <div class="cta-wrapper">
                  <div class="cta-text-wrapper">
                    <div class="heading-small sand-800">More questions? Let us know!</div>
                    <div class="body-text content-secondary">Not convinced yet? Are you missing something valuable in our plan, so it convinces you to join? Let's talk!</div>
                  </div>
                  <a href="mailto:hello@forties.plus?subject=I%20need%20more%20information" class="button secondary w-inline-block">
                    <div class="button-text">Contact us</div>
                  </a>
                </div>
